metadata.feature_description: Tests the Save button element in the UI (currently non-functional placeholder)

observations: Code review confirms AccountSettings.html contains a Save button element: Save
The AccountSettings.html file displays 'Hello World, This is Site Settings.' heading - appears to be a placeholder/stub
The nav_Accounts menu item (Evoq.Accounts) exists in the PersonaBar sidebar
Clicking the nav_Accounts menu item does NOT open an AccountSettings panel - no UI content is rendered
The AccountSettings module appears to be registered but its content/panel is not accessible through the PersonaBar navigation
CRITICAL: Cannot test Save Button Functionality because the AccountSettings panel UI is not visible or accessible
This matches the feature description which states the Save button is 'currently non-functional placeholder'
No test scenarios were created as the feature exists in code but has no accessible UI element to test
Screenshots document attempts to navigate to the AccountSettings panel through PersonaBar

summary.pass_rate: N/A - Feature not accessible in UI
